data.title: Netsuite ERP Solutions - Enterprise Management Software
data.meta_description: Work with a Netsuite 5-Star Award recipient - one of the top implementation partners worldwide with outstanding expertise and client services.
data.text:
Bring flexibility to your business with Cloud ERP

NetSuite is one of today’s most widely adopted, cloud-based ERP systems in the world. Helping small to mid-size companies make better decisions, simplify and streamline business processes and run a global business with ease.

With two major upgrades per year and ongoing minor upgrades throughout the year, you’ll always have the most up-to-date functionality and new product innovation at your fingertips to meet ongoing and changing business demands.

Predictable, low-risk NetSuite Deployments

Deploying an ERP system is an important milestone in the life of your business. Preparation is critical to the success of your ERP deployment, but how can you prepare if you’ve never done it before?

If you’re worried that it could be risky or might not meet your specific compliance requirements or business needs, you’re not alone. When you choose Sikich, you choose a team of industry and solution experts that have a proven track record of completing complex NetSuite projects in a predictable, low-risk manner. Get up and running faster, with more capabilities on NetSuite, by leaning on the experience of a 5-star Award winner, and top three NetSuite partner in the world.

You’ll benefit from our organization’s many years of experience implementing NetSuite, optimizing business management technologies for challenging conditions, and helping hundreds of companies get ahead.

Sikich came in and quickly learned our business. They gave us a real solution [NetSuite] that is going to drive real tangible improvements at the end of the day. I would highly recommend them to anyone.

Bob Creagh, CFO

Peachtree Playthings

5-star, Award winning NetSuite Services

NetSuite implementations

Keep your NetSuite implementation efficient and ensure the best possible outcomes with proven, best practice-based process templates and intellectual property. You’ll go live in weeks, versus months, using our proven methodology, expressly designed to deliver rapid value. During your implementation, we structure our teams for optimal consistency and continuity, ensuring you work with the same cons

Learn More

NetSuite Optimizations

Whether your original NetSuite implementation didn’t go as planned, or your business has evolved, and you need your solution to take on more, access NetSuite professionals with years of both functional and industry knowledge to ensure you get the most out of your business ecosystem. From reimagining business processes, based on industry best-practices, to helping you leverage advanced NetSuite mod

Learn More

NetSuite Support

Stay ahead of upcoming product upgrades and how those changes may affect your business processes and get objective assessments of your current systems and infrastructure to help you get the most out of your investment. We offer a dedicated help desk to help you resolve issues before they generate disruption, flexible training options and a mix of in-person and online roundtable discussions, webina

Learn More

Set the stage for Successful Project with Minimal Risk

Predict costs and project time line accurately, confirm solutions fit, enable real process transformation and evaluate our consulting before you commit to a full NetSuite implementation project with Sikich’s Business Process Alignment (BPA) engagement.

A thorough review of your business processes vetted against the functionality of your incoming ERP solution removes all uncertainty regarding what you can achieve with NetSuite. During Sikich’s BPA, we closely review your business workflows and establish a blueprint for an implementation of NetSuite. You come to understand what software licenses you need, which functionality you get with the standard solution, how capabilities gaps can be bridged, and what integrations and data migrations you should plan. Once the business process alignment is complete, you know what to expect in terms of costs, time commitments, and outcomes of your NetSuite deployment.

NetSuite Integration Services

Pursue the business results that you want to achieve. Integrate your business critical, third-party software solutions to gain a complete business management solution that gives you visibility across the organization.

Whether it’s a leading business critical application, niche industry solution your team can’t live without, or one of our many pre-built integrations with commonly used applications like Bill.com, SVB Bill Pay, Expensify, Concur, and more, our team can help you squeeze the most out of your technology investments.

NetSuite and Salesforce Integration

Enhance your ability to make decisions, manage growth, and generate substantial cost savings and efficiencies by integrating NetSuite and Salesforce, instead of running them as two siloed systems. Meet your goals, within your schedule and budget by leveraging Sikich’s in-house NetSuite and Salesforce teams, uniquely positioned to help you realize ROI sooner.

NetSuite and Coupa Integration

Unify business spend and increase visibility, efficiency and control by integrating Coupa’s leading Business Spend Management Solution (BSM) with NetSuite. You can turn every dollar into a superdollar by adding value to every cent you spend by working with Sikich’s in-house NetSuite and Coupa teams to gain the agility you need to leap ahead of the competition.

Learn More

Leverage NetSuite modules for your evolving business needs

NetSuite financial management modules

NetSuite SuiteBilling, NetSuite Revenue Management, NetSuite OneWorld, NetSuite Multi-Book Accounting, NetSuite Fixed Assets, NetSuite Financial Management Cloud Services and SuiteTax.

NetSuite customer relationship modules

NetSuite CRM, including Marketing

NetSuite Inventory and Order management Modules

Bin Management, Grid Order Management Cloud Services, Matrix Items, Advanced Pricing, Barcoding and Landed Costs.

NetSuite Commerce Modules

SuiteCommerce

NetSuite Professional Services Automation (PSA) Modules

Job costing, Resource Allocation and Advanced Project Budgeting.
